body_text: Oh, there's also the option of using the Wrapped prefix for our default imports, but then the name wouldn't match the file, and I suspect no one wants to go sprinkling the word "Wrapped" in front of every redux-connected component's filename.
body: Oh, there's also the option of using the `Wrapped` prefix for our default imports, but then the name wouldn't match the file, and I suspect no one wants to go sprinkling the word "Wrapped" in front of every redux-connected component's filename.
